task.title: Turning on and Logging On to the Mac
task.shortdesc: Mac is short for Macintosh, which is a type of personal computer developed by Apple Inc.

context.p: If the Mac is not already turned on, you are going to need to do so yourself.

step.cmd: Move your mouse from side to side. If the Mac screen does not light up, reach your hand behind the bottom left corner of the monitor and press the power button.
step.info: If you are unable to locate the button, turn the monitor around so that you can see the button.

step.cmd: Once the Mac turns on, move your mouse so that the pointer on your screen hovers over Guest User.
Click Guest User using your finger resting on the left button of the mouse, and enter the password credentials your supervisor provides you, followed by the Return or Enter key.
step.stepresult: Taken from Google Images You have successfully logged on to the Mac.
